shortDescription: The UpdateVersionVariablesAndPackage VSTS task updates the variables that are used to name the artifact and is used to perform replacements in the application.

versions.validationResultMessage: The Task Contribution PSG.UPDATEVERSIONVARIABLESANDPACKAGE with ID 31f040e5-e040-4336-878a-59a493355536 already exists in the Marketplace. To publish the extension, please ensure you have a unique task id.
